ValidationRule.description: Prevents reps from selection direct annual payments for add-on opportunities
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Direct_Annual__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Annual") ), TEXT(Type) = 'Revenue Opportunity', License_Term_Formula__c < 12 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Direct annual payments are not allowed for license terms less than 12 months, please select direct monthly.
